main event: A circular-shaped object, the size and shape of a light bulb, was observed emitting sparks and blinking as it moved rapidly across the sky over the Portland, Salem, Corvallis, and Oregon area.
interesting points: The object was observed to be moving back and forth as a blinking light with 'spaces'.
The object rapidly faded from view after several minutes of observation.
The sighting occurred during a dark night with smoke and fog in the Portland area.
Wind conditions were recorded, with varying direction and velocity at different altitudes.
A newspaper article reported that a large meteor was seen from multiple locations in the same general area and around the same time as the sighting.
